locutie.beschrijving: A narrative and socio-political re-reading of the Noah story, focusing on God's repentance, the critique of 'God-imperialism', and the rainbow as a sign of peace against nuclear/ecological destruction.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High in terms of socio-historical context (Jahwist, 10th century BC), but highly ideological/thematic rather than strictly verse-by-verse.

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting a new theological paradigm (God as motherly/changing) and directing the hearer toward political resistance.
voorbeelden: Ich möchte die biblische Geschichte erzählen...
Heute bietet Gott uns wieder seinen Bund an...

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: Political awakening, loss of fear, movement from resignation to 'militant' hope.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Explicitly mentioned at the very end as 'der lange Atem'.

voorbeelden: Das ist der Satz, der mir am meisten Angst macht.
Gott verspricht, nicht mehr zu schlagen.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Mostly reported in the 3rd person (constative) rather than enacted in the 2nd person.

voorbeelden: Gott... hat euch längst eure Sünden vergeben.
declaratieven.autoriteit: Strongest in the liturgical appendix, weak in the main body.

indicatoren: Long socio-political examples (Leopard tanks, Mirage jets).
Talking 'about' God's gender and nature for several paragraphs.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Intellectual agreement or political mobilization, but potentially lacking a direct 'encounter' with the Word.

missende_elementen: Direct address of the promise (Toezegging) in the main body.
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer remains an observer of a theological lecture until the very end.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: The absolution is clear but feels like a separate liturgical 'add-on' rather than the heart of the sermon.
voorbeelden: Gott... hat euch längst eure Sünden vergeben.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Subjective 'I' of the preacher sharing thoughts and fears.

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Mostly in the final exhortation and the liturgical absolution.

actueel_present.gebruik: The 'Now' of the political crisis and the final blessing.

foutief_patroon.beschrijving: Long Assertive (Political/Theological analysis) -> Directive (We must resist).
voorbeelden: Analysis of weapon exports -> 'Wir müssen den Naturimperialismus verlernen'.
foutief_patroon.probleem: The imperative is not sufficiently grounded in a present-tense Commissive.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Only fully realized in the 'Sündenbekenntnis und Absolution' section.
voorbeelden: Confession of fear -> Declaration of forgiveness -> Empowerment by the Spirit.
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: Strong, but isolated from the main narrative body.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: Gott hat vergeben... du bist fähig zur Liebe.
voorbeelden_slechte_verhouding: Analysis of the 'Gottesimperialismus' leads directly to the call for resistance without a middle step of grace.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions as a 'Theological-Political Lecture' that describes a new way of seeing God, but only 'performs' the Word in the final liturgical appendix.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Gott unsere Mutter hat ein anderes Verhältnis zur Erde...

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Detailed description of weapon systems (Mirage, Leopard).
zwakke_punten.probleem: Distracts from the illocutionary force of the Gospel.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It is an 'event' of political conscientization, but less of a 'sacramental event' until the absolution.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: The language is too descriptive/analytical to be truly sacramental in the Austinian sense.

openbaringsleer.god_als_spreker: Indirectly. God is spoken 'about' as one who changes.
openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Weak in the body, strong in the absolution.
tekstueel_bewijs: Gott... hat euch längst eure Sünden vergeben.

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Yes, the Spirit is the 'long breath' for the hearer.
tekstueel_bewijs: Der lange Atem, das ist der Heilige Geist.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: The sermon is treated as a means of 'Umkehr' (conversion).
tekstueel_bewijs: Ich möchte... an einigen Stellen innehalten, um Fragen zu stellen.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Shift from 3rd person 'Gott ist/tut' to 2nd person 'Gott kommt zu dir/verspricht euch'.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: Gott verspricht, nicht mehr zu schlagen.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: Gott verspricht DIR heute: Ich werde dich nicht vernichten.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Moves from a report to a promise.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is buried under political analysis.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Interweave the absolution throughout the sermon.
voorbeeldzinnen: In diesem Regenbogen blickt Gott dich heute freundlich an.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The call to action feels like a heavy burden because the 'gift' is only mentioned at the end.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Start with the gift of the new covenant.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A powerful prophetic text, but homiletically it risks being a lecture about God rather than an act of God.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SAT reveals that the preacher isn't just 'sending information' about peace, but trying to 'enact' peace through the Word.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: The focus is not on the beauty of the 'Rainbow' metaphor, but on its illocutionary force as a binding legal sign from God.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT exposes that the 'Absolution' section is the only part where the sermon truly 'happens' as a sacramental event.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: Gott... hat euch längst eure Sünden vergeben.
Ich möchte die biblische Geschichte... erzählen.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of 'Prophetic Constative'—it describes the world and God's will accurately but struggles to bridge the gap into a performative encounter until the liturgical conclusion.
